sentence.Network_en: Drop the dough onto a baking sheet with a teaspoon.

sentence.Network_en: To save time we used packets of pizza dough mix.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了节约时间，我们用了几包做比萨饼的混合面粉。

sentence.Network_en: Turn out the dough on to a floured surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 把生面团倒在撒了面粉的案板上。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English dāg, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch deeg and German Teig, from an Indo-European root meaning 'smear, knead'

entry.def: Dough is a fairly firm mixture of flour, water, and sometimes also fat and sugar. It can be cooked to make bread, pastry, and biscuits.

example.ex: Roll out the dough into one large circle...
example.tran: 将面团擀成大的圆形面皮。

example.ex: Work the flour and yeast mixture together until you have a sticky dough.
example.tran: 将面粉和酵母混在一起和成黏糊糊的面团。

entry.def: You can refer to money as dough .

example.ex: He worked hard for his dough.

means.word_mean: 1. a flour mixture stiff enough to knead or roll

sentences.en: He began to shape the dough into rolls.

jushi.english: Add the remaining flour to make a soft dough.
jushi.chinese: 把剩下的面粉加进去做成一块软面团。

jushi.english: Dough can be kneaded into any shape.
